about_the_game:
You want the good news or the bad news first? Good news: you closed a Chruul portal, congratulations, no more Chruul spawn ruining your day. Bad news: the damage has already been done. The weakened dimensional elasticity of your galaxy has allowed other strange creatures to somehow leak into this dimension. And some are big enough to swallow entire fleets. Good thing you found an ship schematic unlike anything you’ve seen before, hidden away in the depths of Halcyon 6’s data archives.

*NOTE*: Old save games will not see the DLC content. A new game start is required to experience the DLC.

DLC FEATURES


CELESTIAL BEHEMOTHS
  • Hunt and eradicate 5 different species of Celestial Behemoths to obtain Precursor artifacts
  • Upgrade your Precursor ship using the collected artifacts
  • Hunt and eradicate 5 ancient Behemoth Elders for powerful trophies and lore
  • Boost the power of your fleet by equipping Elder trophies onto your ships

PRECURSOR STARSHIP
  • Start your battle against the Chruul on the right foot by adding the Precursor ship to your fleet
  • Upgrade your Precursor ship all the way to TIER 6!
  • Unique New Precursor powers can reduce enemy resistances to make combos easier

short_description: In the wake of the Chruul invasion comes another threat. Celestial Behemoths roam the galaxy feeding on fleets of unsuspecting starships. Hunt them down and collect artifacts to upgrade your powerful new Precursor Starship and unlock the hidden power of Precursor technology!
